title: Little Alchemy 2: Recipe for Making Doctor & How to Create It

steps.title: Combine Human with Hospital or Stethoscope to get Doctor.
steps.content: Combine Human with Hospital or Stethoscope to get Doctor. Human is an element created by combining Time with Animal or Monkey , Clay with Life , or Tool with Animal or Monkey . As for Hospital and Stethoscope, you can get them with the following combinations: Hospital : House or Wall & Sickness or Ambulance [1] X Research source You can also combine House or Wall with Doctor to get Hospital, but this isn't helpful if you don't already have Doctor. Likewise, you can also get Hospital with Doctor and Container . Stethoscope : Tool & Sound or Hospital [2] X Research source You can also combine Doctor with Tool , Drum , or Sound to get Stethoscope, but this isn't helpful if you don't already have Doctor.

steps.title: Using Time.
steps.content: Using Time. Time is an element you unlock after unlocking 100 other elements. You can use Time while creating Doctor in the path listed below [3] X Research source : Water + Earth = Mud Air + Air = Pressure Earth + Pressure = Stone Mud + Stone = Clay Water + Water = Puddle Puddle + Puddle = Pond Pond + Pond = Lake Lake + Lake = Sea Earth + Sea = Primordial Soup Primordial Soup + Time = Life Clay + Life = Human Mud + Fire = Brick Brick + Brick = Wall Life + Mud = Bacteria Human + Bacteria = Sickness Wall + Sickness = Hospital Human + Hospital = Doctor

steps.title: Without using Time.
steps.content: Without using Time. If you don't have Time unlocked, you can still make Doctor. The path will just be slightly different, as listed below [4] X Research source : Water + Earth = Mud Air + Air = Pressure Earth + Pressure = Stone Mud + Stone = Clay Water + Water = Puddle Puddle + Puddle = Pond Pond + Pond = Lake Lake + Lake = Sea Earth + Sea = Primordial Soup Fire + Fire = Energy Primordial Soup + Energy = Life Clay + Life = Human Mud + Fire = Brick Brick + Brick = Wall Life + Mud = Bacteria Human + Bacteria = Sickness Wall + Sickness = Hospital Human + Hospital = Doctor

steps.title: Doctor is used in a few recipes.
steps.content: Doctor is used in a few recipes. These recipes are mostly concerning medicine or other medical-related elements, but not all of them. [5] X Research source Ambulance : Car + Doctor Cyborg : Robot + Doctor Hospital : House or Wall or Container + Doctor Idea : Doctor + Doctor Penicillin : Mold + Doctor Scalpel : Blade or Sword + Doctor Statue : Medusa or Cockatrice (DLC) + Doctor Stethoscope : Tool or Drum or Sound + Doctor Syringe : Needle + Doctor
